Regulatory Disclosure 




Mission 




 
























blisce/ is an investment firm co-headquartered in New York and Paris that is committed to investing differently. Pragmatically optimistic that entrepreneurship, innovation, and purposeful capital can improve our world, we empower people to take real action. We work to be genuinely aligned with all our stakeholders because we believe there is no acceptable financial performance without responsibility. 

















Since 2014, blisce/ has invested in leading U.S. and European companies – including Spotify, Pinterest, Headspace, & Too Good To Go – with 8 exits.blisce/ was the first transatlantic fund to be certified as a B Corp. 























Since 2014, blisce/ has invested in leading U.S. and European companies – including Spotify, Pinterest, Headspace, & Too Good To Go – with 8 exits.blisce/ was the first transatlantic fund to be certified as a B Corp. 





























Our team is in New York and Paris. You can learn about Career Opportunities at blisce/ on our LinkedIn.

‘‘We are thrilled to have blisce/ as our partner and investor. Our shared values and belief in the power of businesses to drive positive change have fueled our efforts in the 17 markets we serve across Europe and North America. With blisce/‘s support, we’ve been able to expand into new cities throughout the United States, bringing our mission to more communities and reducing food waste on an even larger scale.— Mette Lykke, CEO, Too Good To Go

Our shared values and belief in the power of businesses to drive positive change have fueled our efforts in the 17 markets we serve across Europe and North America. Regulatory Disclosure







Portfolio 




 

















CURRENT 









































 




Brut 







Current 































Founders: Guillaume Lacroix, Laurent Lucas, Renaud le Van Kim.
Brut is a global media company that creates short-form video content.
website




 


































 




Candid Co 







Current 































Founders: Nick Greenfield, Bobby Ghoshal.
Candid helps people get the smile they’ve always wanted at a price they can afford.
website




 


































 




Dapper Labs 







Current 































Dapper Labs, the company behind NBA Top Shot, uses blockchain technology to bring NFTs and new forms of digital engagement to fans around the world. Since it was founded in 2018, Dapper Labs has given consumer enthusiasts a real stake in the game by bringing them closer to the brands they love, building engaged and exciting communities for them to contribute to, and producing new pathways for them to become creators themselves.
Crunchbase
Website




 


































 




Dice 







Current 































Founders: Phil Hutcheon.
The world’s most-loved platform to discover and attend live events.
website




 


































 




Empower 







Current 































Empower is helping people access credit affordably, improve their credit health, and rewrite their financial story.
Crunchbase
Website




 


































 




Harry’s 







Current 































Founders: Jeffrey Raider, Andy Katz-Mayfield.
Harry’s allows users to buy razors, German engineered blades and shaving creams.
website




 


































 




Headspace 







Current 































Founders: Andy Puddicombe, Richard Pierson.
Headspace is a digital health platform that provides guided meditation sessions and mindfulness training.
website




 


































 




Misfits Market (Imperfect Foods) 







Current 































Blisce originally invested in Imperfect Foods, which has been acquired by Misfits Market in early 2023.
Crunchbase
Website




 


































 




MWM 







Current 































Founders: Jean-Baptiste Hironde.
MWM is designing and scaling mobile apps powered by in-house AI technologies.
website




 


































 




Redesign Health 







Current 































Redesign Health is a mission-driven innovation platform that launches transformative healthcare companies.
website




 


































 




Sorare 







Current 































Sorare is a global fantasy football game where managers can trade official digital collectibles. It is on a mission to make crypto fun and accessible to all through fantasy football. Based in Paris, Sorare provides a soccer team management game with digital NFT cards that fans can collect and trade.
Crunchbase
Website




 


































 




Talkiatry 







Current 































Talkiatry is a national technology enabled mental health practice that provides in-network psychiatry and therapy.
Crunchbase
Website




 


































 




Too Good To Go 







Current 































Too Good To Go helps everyday people fight food waste in their local communities by connecting them to restaurants and grocery stores with surplus meals and ingredients through an app.
website




 


































 




Wecasa 







Current 































Wecasa is a data-driven marketplace that transforms care services by focusing on user experience. Wecasa’s mission is to make care services simple and accessible for a better quality of life. Through its app, users can book in seconds a reliable Professional for care services at home.
Crunchbase
Website




 


































 




Welcome to the Jungle 







Current 































Welcome to the Jungle is a multichannel media and job board company that aims to inspire individuals to thrive in their professional lives.
Crunchbase
website




 


































 











‘‘As an active and thoughtful investor, blisce/ was an incredible value add to our business above and beyond the capital. Their team always went the extra mile to help us navigate complex marketplace dynamics which ultimately helped lead to being successfully acquired. Their team is A+.— Jed Stiller, Co-Founder / Co-CEO, Stadium Goods 

















 





‘‘As an active and thoughtful investor, blisce/ was an incredible value add to our business above and beyond the capital. Their team always went the extra mile to help us navigate complex marketplace dynamics which ultimately helped lead to being successfully acquired. Their team is A+.— Jed Stiller, Co-Founder / Co-CEO, Stadium Goods 

















EXIT 









































 




Adore me 







Exit 































Founders: Morgan Hermand-Waiche, Gary Bravard.
Adore Me is a disruptive lingerie e-commerce startup headquartered in New York, NY. Adore Me was founded to shake up the lingerie industry, lower its prices, speed up its fashion, and make it accessible to everyone. Winner of the 2017 Customer Engagement Awards, awarded New York’s Fastest-Growing Companies from Crain’s in 2016 and received the Top Retailers to Watch honor in 2016 from Business Insider.
website




 


































 




Casper 







Exit 































Founders: Neil Parikh, Luke Sherwin, Philip Krim, Constantin Eis, Gabriel Flateman.
Casper is a sleep startup that launches a comfortable mattress sold directly to consumers, eliminating commission ­driven, inflated prices.
website




 


































 




Le Tote 







Exit 































Founders: Brett Northart, Rakesh Tondon.
Le Tote is an online fashion subscription service, delivering rental fashion directly to women’s doors.
website




 


































 




Managed by Q 







Exit 































Founders: Dan Teran, Saman Rahmanian.
Managed by Q provides subscription and on-demand office services, from cleaning and maintenance to supply replenishment and wellness.
website




 


































 




Pinterest 







Exit 































Founders: Ben Silbermann, Evan Sharp, Paul Sciarra.
Pinterest is a visual bookmarking tool for saving and discovering creative ideas.
website




 


































 




Spotify 







Exit 































Founders: Daniel Ek, Martin Lorentzon.
Spotify is a commercial music streaming service that provides restricted digital content from a range of record labels and artists.
website




 


































 




Stadium Goods 







Exit 































Founders: Jed Stiller, John McPheters.
Stadium Goods is an online marketplace for sought after sneakers and streetwear.
website




 


































 




Teads 







Exit 































Founders: Loic Soubeyrand, Olivier Reynaud, Pierre Chappaz, Andrea Febbrai, Bertrand Quesada, Gilles Moncaubeing, Laurent Binard, Loic Jaures.
Teads invented outstream video advertising and is the no.1 video advertising marketplace in the world.
website

Regulatory
Disclosure/  




The Blisce Group is an international investment management group that focuses on private equity and venture capital opportunities in technology companies and startups.The Blisce Group includes Blisce Advisors, which operates in Paris and provides direct advisory services to the Blisce Group’s clients, and Blisce US LLC, which operates in New York and focused on venture capital investment opportunities, at times on behalf of the Blisce Group.Within the Blisce Group, Charles-Henri Prevost and Romain Sion are personnel solely of Blisce Advisors, and Sam Giber is personnel solely of Blisce US LLC.
